room_title: Escape room "The Lost Professor" by One Way Out Escape Rooms in Lynchburg
review: This is a great family outing. We had family members from 20’s to 70’s. All 10 of us were fully engaged in the Lost Professor room. I highly recommend One Way Out for a great option for a family activity.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Professor" by One Way Out Escape Rooms in Lynchburg
review: What a great place! The people were so nice. My team did The Lost Professor room and had a blast. It was challenging and fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Professor" by One Way Out Escape Rooms in Lynchburg
review: Amazing experience! The Lost Professor room was very realistic and well done. Staff were professional, courteous and fun! It's a must do for any group!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Professor" by One Way Out Escape Rooms in Lynchburg
review: A one-of-a-kind experience that I'll never forget! The Lost Professor room was challenging, immersive, and incredibly fun! Can't wait to try other rooms in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Professor" by One Way Out Escape Rooms in Lynchburg
review: Thank you so much for an amazing and fun experience! My friends and I did the Lost Professor, and it was really fun to pretend to be "Indiana Jones" for a while - though I am very glad there were no snakes because I hate snakes. lol I will definitely be back!
